text: Follow up.. if refresh token never expired, but OAuth access token does. Could we get a new access token from refresh token API endpoint, when OAuth access token is expired? Or should we keep refresh the token every 30min before the OAuth token is expired in order to avoid BAD_HUB error?

You should keep refreshing the token every 30 mins and thatâ€™s the general process. For better understanding you can go through the link to get the complete details 

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth>
Thanks for your solution, will try this. :pray:

Hey everyone! is there a way to import the file from file manager to particular contact file attachment to notes. i tried with engagement API notes this only retrieve note that we have upload id . how to find the file that upload to particular contact and how to upload file to particular contact via API. i trying this for two days,
